name: Seihou - The Embodiment of Lenovo-Denovo
description:
A simple open source bullet hell based on 'Touhou 6 - The Embodiment of Scarlet Devil' with 2 levels and bosses. 

It was originally a messy project made for the purpose of learning C# and .Net some years ago. But we fixed it and made it more enjoyable for this release.

The default controls are:

  • Arrowkeys to move
  • Z to shoot
  • X to use a bomb
  • Shift to move more slowly
